contact-needs-login: To send messages you need to be logged in!
contact-impossible-no-email: This user cannot be contacted via email.
contact-email-hint: (Otherwise, please put contact information in your message)
contact-field-empty: No message sent: You must provide a message
contact-no-receiving-contact-address: No message sent: This user cannot be contacted via mail.
contact-no-sending-contact-address: No message sent: You wanted your contact address included but don't have one in your profile.
contact-sending-failed: No message sent: An unknown error occurred.
